results.title: Nail-patella syndrome with an emphasis on the risk of renal and ocular findings.
results.text_hl: We describe a 6-year-old girl presenting with @<m>DISEASE_Nail_dysplasia_isolated_congenital</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C538333 @@@nail dysplasia@@@ affecting all nails and hands for 2 years.

citations.NLM: Kamath S, Bhagwandas K. Nail-patella syndrome with an emphasis on the risk of renal and ocular findings. Pediatr Dermatol. 2010 Jan-Feb;27(1):95-7. PMID: 20199424
